alert.note: Alert for Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 22 at 1:52PM MST until December 25 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet, mainly on southwest facing slopes. This includes the mountains around Cooke City. * WHERE...Absaroka/Beartooth Mountains. * WHEN...From 5 PM this evening to 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Outdoor recreation will be impacted by the accumulating snowfall and gusty winds on the mountain tops. Avalanche danger may increase in the Cooke City area.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1. Additional graphics for this hazard can be found at http://www.weather.gov/billings
